zone.line: While I ‸wasovercome by these feelings I
left the spot where I had committed the
murder and sought a more secluded
hiding place. At that moment I peceiv
ing a woman passing near me,— she
was young; not indeed so beautiful as
her who portrait I held but of an
agreable in aspect & blooming in the
loveliness of health & youth. And here
I thought is one one of those whose
smiles are bestowed on all but me
but She shall not escape my vengeance
thanks to the lessons of Felix & the
sanguinary laws of man, I have learnedknow how
to work mischief. I approached her
unpeceived, and placed the portrait
securely in one of the folds of her
dress.
For some day I haunted the spot
where these scenes had taken place
sometimes wishing to see you some
times resolved to quit the world & it
miseries for ever. at length II have wandered
towards to these mountains and have ranged
throughin their immense recesses consumed
by a burning passion which you
alone can gratify—And we may not
part untill you have promised
to comply with my requisitions. I am
alone & miserable. Man will not
associate with but one as deformed
and horrible as my self would not
deny herself to me. This being you
must create.for me.
